tool_description: Creates structured menu templates based on event type, cuisine preferences, and meal specifications, providing a foundation for detailed menu development.

event_type.description: Type of event (wedding, corporate, birthday, conference, etc.)

cuisine_style.description: Primary cuisine style (italian, asian, american, mediterranean, fusion, etc.)

meal_types.description: Types of meals to include (breakfast, lunch, dinner, cocktail, dessert)

error_messages: Invalid event type: Provide a recognized event type such as wedding, corporate, birthday, conference, or similar.
Unsupported cuisine style: Use a standard cuisine category like italian, asian, american, mediterranean, or fusion.
Invalid meal types: Select from breakfast, lunch, dinner, cocktail, dessert with at least one option.
Guest count out of range: Provide a positive integer between 1 and 10000.
Invalid budget tier: Choose from economy, standard, premium, or luxury.
usage: Specify event_type, cuisine_style, meal_types array, and guest_count. Optionally set budget_tier. The tool generates a structured menu template with course categories and suggested dish types.

template_id.description: Unique identifier for the generated menu template

course_structure.description: List of course categories (appetizer, main, dessert, etc.)

suggested_dishes.description: Recommended dishes for each course based on cuisine and event type

serving_style.description: Recommended service format (buffet, plated, family-style, stations)
